 Alphah:::
"Yes" said softly and with sad voice
  black_ben14 <black_ben14@...> wrote: He ignore Alpha for a moment without saying a word."Yeah,and you?Did 
you recovered some strenght while we were in battle?"he said with a 
neutral voice.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
>  Alphah::
> Alphah looked Pegatron's leave CR's room, "Pegatron????"said 
Alphah"Are U ok???? "
>  
>   black_ben14 <black_ben14@h...> wrote: As the CR chamber open 
slowly,Pegatron is standing in it.Is battle 
> damage are gone and he feel a lot better now.He then slowly walks in 
> the middle of the room wondering where were the others."I 
> wish.....all of this could end....I really wish that..."he whispered 
> while clenching his fist.He then go where the rest of the team is.
>
